statements: SELECT * FROM financial_data LIMIT 10;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM financial_data WHERE account_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM financial_data ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM financial_data WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT account_id, description FROM financial_data WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-03-31';
SELECT * FROM financial_data LIMIT 5;
SELECT account_id, amount FROM financial_data WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, description FROM financial_data WHERE account_id = 1002 AND amount < 5000;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date FROM financial_data WHERE account_id IN (1001, 1003) ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT account_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM financial_data GROUP BY account_id HAVING total_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM financial_data ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, currency FROM financial_data WHERE currency = 'USD';
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM financial_data WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM financial_data WHERE transaction_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM financial_data ORDER BY amount DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM financial_data WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, currency FROM financial_data WHERE currency = 'USD' AND amount < 500 ORDER BY amount ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, currency, transaction_date FROM financial_data WHERE currency IN ('USD', 'EUR') ORDER BY currency DESC, transaction_date ASC;
SELECT f.transaction_id, f.reason, fd.amount, fd.currency FROM fraudulent_transactions f JOIN financial_data fd ON f.transaction_id = fd.transaction_id ORDER BY f.transaction_id ASC;
SELECT fd.transaction_id, fd.currency, f.reason FROM financial_data fd LEFT JOIN fraudulent_transactions f ON fd.transaction_id = f.transaction_id WHERE f.reason IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM budgeting;
SELECT category, amount FROM budgeting WHERE budget_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT budget_id, category, amount FROM budgeting WHERE amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM forecasting WHERE revenue < expenses;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, amount FROM fraud_detection WHERE is_fraudulent = true;
SELECT * FROM budgeting ORDER BY budget_date DESC, amount ASC
SELECT category, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM budgeting WHERE amount > 500 GROUP BY category HAVING total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC, category
SELECT budget_id, category, amount, budget_date FROM budgeting WHERE category = 'Travel' AND amount BETWEEN 1000 AND 2000 ORDER BY budget_id
SELECT * FROM fraud_detection WHERE is_fraudulent = TRUE ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT transaction_id, amount, is_fraudulent, EXTRACT(YEAR FROM transaction_date) AS transaction_year FROM fraud_detection WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM transaction_date) = 2022 ORDER BY amount DESC
SELECT * FROM BudgetData ORDER BY category DESC
SELECT id, transaction_date, amount FROM FinancialData WHERE amount > 1000
SELECT description, amount FROM FinancialData WHERE transaction_date > '2022-01-01' AND transaction_date < '2022-02-01'
SELECT category, budget_amount, year FROM BudgetData WHERE year = 2022
SELECT model_name, predicted_amount FROM ForecastData ORDER BY forecast_date
SELECT id, transaction_date, amount, description FROM FinancialData WHERE id = 1;
SELECT category, budget_amount FROM BudgetData WHERE year = 2022 ORDER BY budget_amount DESC;
SELECT id, forecast_date, predicted_amount, model_name FROM ForecastData WHERE forecast_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM FraudDetection WHERE suspected_fraud = TRUE AND fraud_reason LIKE '%fraud%';
SELECT description, amount FROM FinancialData WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Budget;
SELECT expense_type, expense_amount FROM Expenses WHERE expense_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT budget_id, amount, budget_year FROM Budget ORDER BY budget_year DESC;
SELECT forecast_id, department_id, forecast_date, forecasted_amount FROM Forecasts WHERE forecast_date > '2022-09-30';
SELECT transaction_type, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM Transactions WHERE department_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM Budget WHERE budget_year = 2022 ORDER BY amount DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT expense_type, expense_amount, expense_date FROM Expenses WHERE expense_amount > 1000 ORDER BY expense_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT forecast_date, forecasted_amount FROM Forecasts WHERE forecasted_amount < 5000 ORDER BY forecast_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT department_id, transaction_type, transaction_amount FROM Transactions WHERE transaction_amount BETWEEN 200 AND 500 ORDER BY department_id, transaction_type ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT activity_type, activity_description FROM Fraudulent_Activities ORDER BY activity_date DESC LIMIT 5;
